message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I'm getting close to your price, but I still think $10,500 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,250. Can you consider that?
